lyrics: No wonder that I thought that they were going out of styleI just had to meet you to make Christmas seem worthwhileLast year when I had to send my Christmas cardsI had to sign my name aloneBut now your name is next to mineAnd there's more love in every lineI'm wishing a Merry Christmas to everyone I've knownNo more blue Christmas,'they'll all be brightNo more just pretending to be happy when I'm sadGoing through the motions while others feel gladNo more blue Christmas' now that I've found youOh, no wonder that I thought that they were going out of styleI just had to meet you to make Christmas seem worthwhileLast year when I had to buy my Christmas giftsI had to do it on my ownChampagne parties everywhereBut without you I just didn't careNow there's more than just a Christmas tree to decorate my homeNo more blue Christmas' now that I've found youNo wonder that I thought that they were going out of styleI just had to meet you to make Christmas seem worthwhileNo more blue Christmas' now that I've found youNo wonder that I thought that they were going out of styleI just had to meet you to make Christmas seem worthwhile---ohI just had to meet you to make Christmas seem worthwhile(Merry Christmas everyone)
